languages.text: "Ты кое-что украл у меня, Руолдо! Я приш{rt_mf|ел|ла} вернуть это назад".
"You have stolen something from me, Ruoldo! I have come to reclaim it."
languages.original_text: "Ты кое-что украл у меня, Руолдо! Я приш{rt_mf|ел|ла} вернуть это назад".

traits.locale_text: "You have stolen something from me, Ruoldo! I have come to reclaim it."

languages.text: “你偷了我的东西，罗尔多！我要把它拿回来了。”
languages.original_text: "You have stolen something from me, Ruoldo! I have come to reclaim it."

traits.locale_text: “你偷了我的东西，罗尔多！我要把它拿回来了。”

languages.text: 「ルオルド、奪ったものを返してもらう。力づくでもな」
languages.original_text: "You have stolen something from me, Ruoldo! I have come to reclaim it."

traits.locale_text: 「ルオルド、奪ったものを返してもらう。力づくでもな」

languages.text: «¡Ha robado algo que me pertenece, Ruoldo! Vengo a recuperarlo».
languages.original_text: "You have stolen something from me, Ruoldo! I have come to reclaim it."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ha robado algo que me pertenece, Ruoldo! Vengo a recuperarlo».

languages.text: "Benden bir şey çaldın Ruoldo! Onu geri almaya geldim."
languages.original_text: "You have stolen something from me, Ruoldo! I have come to reclaim it."

traits.locale_text: "Benden bir şey çaldın Ruoldo! Onu geri almaya geldim."

languages.text: « Vous m'avez volé quelque chose, Ruoldo ! Je suis {rt_mf|venu|venue} le récupérer. »
languages.original_text: "You have stolen something from me, Ruoldo! I have come to reclaim it."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'avez volé quelque chose, Ruoldo ! Je suis {rt_mf|venu|venue} le récupérer. »

languages.text: "Ihr habt mir etwas gestohlen, Ruoldo! Ich bin hier, um es mir zurückzuholen."
languages.original_text: "You have stolen something from me, Ruoldo! I have come to reclaim it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt mir etwas gestohlen, Ruoldo! Ich bin hier, um es mir zurückzuholen."
